segment.source: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation

segment.source: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation

segment.source: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation

segment.source: Use the App-V Management Console to add the certificate and configure the App-V Management Server for enhanced security.
segment.target: Use the App-V Management Console to add the certificate and configure the App-V Management Server for enhanced security.

segment.source: You can use the following procedure to configure security post-installation.
segment.target: You can use the following procedure to configure security post-installation.

segment.source: To configure Management Server security post-installation
segment.target: To configure Management Server security post-installation

segment.source: Open the App-V Management Console, and connect to the Management Service with App-V administrator privileges.
segment.target: Open the App-V Management Console, and connect to the Management Service with App-V administrator privileges.

segment.source: Expand the server, expand Server Groups, and then select the appropriate server group with which the Management Server was registered.
segment.target: Expand the server, expand Server Groups, and then select the appropriate server group with which the Management Server was registered.

segment.source: Right-click the Management Server object, and select Properties.
segment.target: Right-click the Management Server object, and select Properties.

segment.source: On the Ports tab, click Server Certificate and complete the wizard to select the properly provisioned certificate.
segment.target: On the Ports tab, click Server Certificate and complete the wizard to select the properly provisioned certificate.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If no certificates are displayed in the wizard, a certificate has not been provisioned or the certificate does meet the requirements of App-V.
segment.target: If no certificates are displayed in the wizard, a certificate has not been provisioned or the certificate does meet the requirements of App-V.

segment.source: Click Next to continue on to the Welcome To Certificate Wizard page.
segment.target: Click Next to continue on to the Welcome To Certificate Wizard page.

segment.source: Select the correct certificate in the Available Certificates screen.
segment.target: Select the correct certificate in the Available Certificates screen.

segment.source: Click Finish.
segment.target: Click Finish.

segment.source: After completing the wizard, clear RTSP as an available listening port.
segment.target: After completing the wizard, clear RTSP as an available listening port.

segment.source: This prevents connections from being made over a non-secure communication channel.
segment.target: This prevents connections from being made over a non-secure communication channel.

segment.source: Click Apply, and restart the Microsoft Virtual Application Server service.
segment.target: Click Apply, and restart the Microsoft Virtual Application Server service.

segment.source: Use the service’s MMC snap-in to accomplish this task.
segment.target: Use the service’s MMC snap-in to accomplish this task.

segment.target: Related topics
